import React from 'react'; export const AuthorDetails = () => { return (

John Doe

Overview

Author Bio

Experienced author with a demonstrated history of writing in various genres. Strong creative professional skilled in Fiction, Non-fiction, and Technical Writing. Published multiple books and articles in renowned publications.

Published Jan 2023
